metadata.dc:author: del Cañizo Fernández-Roldán, A
Gómez González, J L
metadata.dc:description: Bioethical principles are applied trying to solve some of the problems arose by the implantation of cochlear devices in deaf-mute patients, especially in the case of children. Justice problems due to the scarcity of resources are also described.
metadata.dc:title: Etica de la aplicación de implantes cocleares a sordomudos.
[Bioethics and implantation of cochlear devices in deaf-mute patients].
